text: "Women" is a 1987 song by English heavy metal band Def Leppard and is the second single from their fourth studio album Hysteria. It went to number 80 in the United States. In most pops of the world Animal is the leading single from the album. ==Track listing== ;US Mercury Records 888 757-7 DJ 7" single ;US Mercury Records 888 757-7 7" single ;US CD single ;Canada 7" single ==References== Category:1987 songs Category:Def Leppard songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Women (Def Leppard song)
